mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.href AS "href", a.image AS "image", a.sort AS "sort", a.title AS "title"
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM jhi_banner a
AND a.title LIKE '%'||#{title}||'%' '%'+#{title}+'%' concat('%',#{title},'%')
ORDER BY ${page.orderBy}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO jhi_banner( href, image, sort, title ) VALUES ( #{href}, #{image}, #{sort}, #{title} )
